name: Little Eden
description:
In this mix of farming simulator and spaceship shooter, you control Little Eden, an independent Farm Ship fending for herself and its precious resources while flying through the skies of the Soaring Plains. Destroy planetoids, collect seeds to plant, craft ammunition and fight for survival against the terrible Pirate Coalition.

Explore and collect resources

Explore the different biomes, harvest the planetoids and gather resources to help your adventure.


Plant and Harvest unique seeds

From the hardy Iron Nut to the unstable Dragon Toadstool, you plant your own ammunition in Little Eden.


Use Powerful Guns

Be it a machine gun, laser or grenades, make your enemies regret ever crossing your piece of sky.


Beware the pirates!

Little Eden’s Soaring Plains are populated by terrible pirates, be careful while exploring, engaging in combat with pirates might be lethal. Are you pilot enough to survive such encounters?


Conquer Upgrades

By exploring enough you will find improvements for Little Eden. Upgrade your guns, defenses and maneuverability and seek new heights.
